name: Shwood Canby Sunglasses - Unisex
description: Blending a classic silhouette with natural materials and Italian acetate, Shwood eyewear stands out.Wood frame is 13-layer laser-cut premium walnut.Italian acetate frame has temple accents of pacific northwest pine cones set in resin.Carl Zeiss CR39 lenses block 100% UV and offers precise optical clarity.Sealed with non-allergenic, organic waxes and oils that protect the frame from drying out.Comfortable spring hinges.Travel case helps protect your glasses, but Shwood recommends that when you're not wearing them, keep them in a hard case or safe place.In the box: sunglasses, recycled chipboard travel case and lens cloth.
